text: wakaAnuwA@ yaquwluwna >a}i*aA mitonaA wakun~aA turaAbFA waEiZa`mFA >a'in~aA lamaboEuwvuwna

text: EalaY`^ >an n~ubad~ila >amova`lakumo wanun$i}akumo fiY maA laA taEolamuwna
